org.uclab.mm.kcl.edkat.controller

Class RulesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uclab.mm.kcl.edkat.controller.RulesController

  • @Controller
 @SessionAttributes(value="user")
public class RulesController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is controller class for the rule this controller handles create, update, retrieve of rules, conditions, conclusions, and situation
    Since:
    2015-08-16
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Taqdir Ali

      • addRule

        @RequestMapping(value="/rules/add",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addRule(@ModelAttribute(value="situationRuleWrapper")
                                                                                                   SituationRuleWrapper situationRuleWrapper,
                                                                                                   org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This method is physically add the rule with corresponding conditions, conclusions and situations into the knowledge base but this function internally also check the duplication for conditions, conclusions and situations.
        Parameters:
        situationRuleWrapper -
        Returns:
        view for rule in edit mode.

      • addRuleForService

        @RequestMapping(value="/rules/addRule",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String addRuleForService(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                 SituationRuleWrapper situationRuleWrapper)
        This method is physically add the rule with corresponding conditions, conclusions and situations into the knowledge base but this function internally also check the duplication for conditions, conclusions and situations.
        Parameters:
        situationRuleWrapper -
        Returns:
        successfully added rule id.
